short_summary: Repairing Collins DME 4000 device, from date of contract award to March 31st 2023
description: Full description of the procurement request is provided in the tender notice URL:\\
full_summary:
# Repair Services for Collins DME 4000

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01021853
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** T8493-22-0016(1)
* **Publication Date:** January 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 31, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Amendment Date:** January 27, 2023

## Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 330 Sparks St, Ottawa, ON K1A 0N5, Canada
* **End-User Entity:** Transport Canada
* **End-User Entity Address:** 330 Sparks St, Ottawa, ON K1A 0N5, Canada

## Goods and Services

* **GSEC:** Aircraft Accessories and Components (Military) - Repair and Overhaul (NIBS Code: JX1680)
* **Scope of Work:** Transport Canada requires the repair of one Collins DME-4000 DME unit, in accordance with the Original Equipment Manufacturer specifications.

## Tender Process

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Not applicable, as the total value of the requirement is expected to be below the applicable thresholds.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Tanya Nadeau
* **Email:** tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 343-575-6684

## Documents

* **Request for Proposal:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/de14b32fbf3aa84da0eef80c22784e03/rfp_t8493-22-00161_e.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/17/de14b32fbf3aa84da0eef80c22784e03/rfp_t8493-22-00161_e.pdf)
* **Queries and Answers:** [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/27/61dae22c88ae4d328332402a4d95871b/qa1_t8493-22-00161.pdf
